markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Giant Snare](/Feats.aspx?ID=6417) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 216 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=265)

**Prerequisites**
[Snarecrafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6414)

</column>

---

You can create bigger [snares](/Traits.aspx?ID=809) for quick deployment, making it more likely for a creature to walk into your snares. When you prepare snares for quick deployment, you can prepare some of them as giant snares. A giant snare takes up a 10-foot-by-10-foot area but costs two of your quick deployment snares. A giant snare can trigger from a creature entering any portion of its area, and all its effects apply over the full area.
name: Giant Snare

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 10" pfs="Standard" > Giant Snare Source Player Core 2 pg. 216 1.1 Archetype Snarecrafter Prerequisites Snarecrafter Dedication --- You can create bigger snares for quick deployment, making it more likely for a creature to walk into your snares. When you prepare snares for quick deployment, you can prepare some of them as giant snares. A giant snare takes up a 10-foot-by-10-foot area but costs two of your quick deployment snares. A giant snare can trigger from a creature entering any portion of its area, and all its effects apply over the full area.
